originalText.text:
Plenty of machines available when we visited. $3 for a regular sized load of laundry to wash and 25¬¢ for every 7 minutes to dry - payable in quarters- the man working there exchanged our dollars for quarters no problem. We were glad to not have to purchase a card to load up with money like some other laundromats require since we‚Äôre only visiting.

Also Central Park is nearby so we set a timer on our phone for 30 minutes for the wash and 1 hour for the dryer which gave us time to enjoy our day and not waste it washing clothes.

Note: There‚Äôs a sign that says you can‚Äôt use their dryers if you don‚Äôt wash  there and also no dogs allowed.

We were glad to not have to purchase a card to load up with money like some other laundromats require since we‚Äôre only visiting.

originalText.text: I use wash and fold services here with delivery. When i call for pick up or delivery, they are literally at my apartment in less than 5 minutes. Obviously, I'm really close to them, but the point is they are super prompt and will carry 3 big laundry bags at a time up 5th floor walk up without any fuss. But don't forget to give them a good tip, especially if they had to climb stairs. Laundry is always ready the next day, but you do need to call them to tell them when to deliver it back. Otherwise, the laundry will just sit at their laundry mat. Also, beddings and blankets are extra and not calculated by weight like everything else, sometimes it can really rack up. Typically, I pull those items  and do it myself.

Typically, I pull those items  and do it myself.

originalText.text:
Fair prices, kind owners, great service.

I've been coming here for over half a year now. Today after I washed my clothes, there were people in the way of all the dryers. I tried to go around them but couldn't. The lady came over and made space for me to put my clothes in one of the open dryers, which was very kind of her. When I returned, my clothes were in the dryer beneath the one I had put them in. Turns out I had put the quarters in the wrong slot üò≠ The lady was nice enough to change all of my clothes into the bottom dryer for me üôèüèΩ

Thank you!! Very Happy that this is my neighborhood laundromat

originalText.text: This laundromat is a quick walk from Mt. Sinai, and a good option for people washing clothes for someone who's hospitalized. Grab a Patient Property Bag from the hospital, slap their clothes in the bag, bring the bag to this laundromat, and get a small bottle of detergent for $3.

originalText.text: I'm so meticulous when it comes to the laundry business. I was impressed with their service only by this location. I appreciated the help I got from there. All of my clothes have been cleaned and they smell fresh. Great and fabulously convenient service!
